about_the_game:
What will you risk to rise to greatness in this strange land?

Wyld Land is the fast-paced 2D bullet hell roguelite MMO where you explore a dangerous world corrupted by ancient technology. Dodge waves of bullets, collect powerful gear, explore ever-changing dungeons, and uncover the mysteries of a fallen civilization.

  • Become a Runner and take on remanants of the Ethos, an ancient civilization that left behind a disaster which your people scavenge to carve out a life.

  • Enter a world where risk is around every corner, and one mistake will end your life -- until you're reborn to try it all again.

  • Play with thousands of others connected around the globe with fast-twitch servers designed to dodge down to the pixel.

  • Customize your character with Echoes as you learn the secrets of the past left behind, and progress even through death.

  • Explore an overworld filled with secrets to discover, and delve into ever-changing dungeons with unique boss designs.

  • Unlock achievements, run Corrupted dungeons of increasing difficulty, and attain exotic weapons to become truly great.

Key Features

  • INTENSE BULLET HELL COMBAT Master the art of weaving through bullet patterns while unleashing your own arsenal. Choose from a variety of weapons including assault rifles, fusion rifles, shotguns, and more. Every encounter is a dance of destruction.

  • RISK VS REWARD Death means losing all your gear - but some abilities, known as Echoes, persist through death. Build your character's power gradually while risking it all on each run.

  • DYNAMIC MULTIPLAYER Team up with other Runners or go it solo seeking rare loot. The world is shared, and danger lurks around every corner. Your actions affect and are affected by other players in real-time.

  • DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION Customize your build through equipment choices and Spikes - enhancements found throughout the game world. Mix and match weapons, armor, and spikes to create your perfect loadout.

  • RICH WORLD TO EXPLORE Delve into mysterious dungeons, explore the corrupted Dark Forest, and uncover the truth about The Ethos - the ancient civilization whose hubris led to calamity.

  • EVER-CHANGING DUNGEONS Dungeons in Wyld Land are procedurally generated, so you'll never see the same one twice. For the truly brave, pop corrupted shards and take on difficult mutations as the difficulty scales up even further -- but the rewards get better, too.

  • CONSTANT EVOLUTION Regular updates bring new content, challenges, and mysteries to uncover. We plan to release Seasons on a regular basis which will shake up the meta of the game, introduce new weapons and gear, and provide new challenging bosses to keep the experience fresh.

Venture into Wyld Land, where every run is different, death is just the beginning, and the secrets of a fallen civilization await discovery. Will you become a legendary Runner, or just another victim of the Wyld?

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
